products.name: TrackR Wallet (U14-C0441)
products.shortDescription: Lost keys and misplaced smartphones become a hassle of the past with TrackR on your side. Attach the compact coin-sized device onto an item of your choosing and frequent losing, and activate the TrackR app to quickly locate it next time it goes missing. The tracked item will ring audibly, or display on a map so you can find it easily.

products.name: TrackR Sticker (U14-C0442)
products.shortDescription: Lost keys and misplaced smartphones become a hassle of the past with TrackR on your side. Attach the compact coin-sized device onto an item of your choosing and frequent losing, and activate the TrackR app to quickly locate it next time it goes missing. The tracked item will ring audibly, or display on a map so you can find it easily.

products.name: Garmin nuvi 6.1" GPS (Nuvi 66LM)
products.shortDescription: With the Garmin nüvi GPS, you can easily reach your destination without fumbling around with maps. This GPS is preloaded with maps of Canada and the United States and tells you directions out loud so you can focus on the road. The large 6.1" LCD shows off everything clearly so you can see things without squinting.

products.name: Garmin nüvi 5" GPS (2595LMT)
products.shortDescription: With a large 5" touchscreen display and powerful Garmin navigation, the nüvi 2595LMT GPS is a road warrior to be reckoned with. It comes with lifetime traffic and map updates, as well as voice activation, Bluetooth hands-free calling, and more convenient features to help you get from point A to point B without breaking a sweat.

products.name: Garmin Nuvi 5" GPS (2555LM)
products.shortDescription: With a large 5" touchscreen display and advanced navigation features, the Garmin nüvi 2555LM GPS navigator will take the lead wherever you go. Free lifetime map updates, advanced lane guidance, and turn-by-turn spoken directions will get you to your destination quickly and efficiently.

products.name: CompuStar 1-Way Remote Car Starter & Bypass (CS-800S-BPF) With Geek Squad Installation
products.shortDescription: Make sure you don't get into a cold car ever again with this remote car starter combo. It has a range of over 300m and features the ability to lock and unlock your car as well as remotely start it from afar. It also includes a multi-function bypass.

products.name: TrackR Sticker Tracking Device - 2 Pack
products.shortDescription: Lost keys and misplaced smartphones become a hassle of the past with TrackR on your side. Attach the compact coin-sized device onto an item of your choosing and frequent losing, and activate the TrackR app to quickly locate it next time it goes missing. The tracked item will ring audibly, or display on a map so you can find it easily.

products.name: Genius Full HD Vehicle Recorder With Built-In G-Sensor (DVR-FHD590)
products.shortDescription: Document the road ahead with the Genius DVR-FHD590 Full HD vehicle recorder. With a 5MP camera sensor and built-in G-sensor, this camera can record the driving conditions around your or capture evidence in an accident. It features a 2.4" panel where you can watch replays of your recordings.

products.name: Magellan RoadMate 5" GPS (RM5230RGLUC) - Refurbished
products.shortDescription: Never get lost again with the help of this Magellan RoadMate 5230T-LM. With the Landmark Guidance your routing instructions use landmarks instead of street names. You'll hear instructions like “Turn left at the Gas Station". Navigation just got easier and your trips will be more enjoyable and care-free.

products.name: TomTom VIA 5" GPS (1535M) - Refurbished
products.shortDescription: *Refurbished. The TomTom VIA 1535M with 5" touchscreen puts you in control of your drive. Feel comfortable in traffic in any North American city with features such as Advanced Lane Guidance and Spoken Street Names. Latest Map Guarantee ensures you have the most recent data to get to your destination.

products.name: TomTom World Traveller Edition 5" GPS (VIA 1505M WTE)
products.shortDescription: With the TomTom VIA 1505M World Traveller Edition, you'll navigate Canada, the US and Western Europe like a local. It comes with Lifetime Maps, and ensures you always find your way around on the 5" touchscreen.

products.name: Kenwood 6.1" MP3 2-DIN Car Multimedia System
products.shortDescription: Rock to your fave tunes on long drives or during your daily car commute with the Kenwood DDX371 multimedia receiver. This double-din in-dash monitor receiver sports Bluetooth capability so you can wirelessly stream audio from your compatible mobile devices and even take hands-free phone calls.

products.name: Pioneer FH-X721BT USB/MP3 Bluetooth Double-DIN Car Deck with iPhone/iPod Control
products.shortDescription: Pioneer makes the most of your digital world while you drive.  This deck mixes your music library into a non-stop party playlist enhanced by colourful illumination, and voice command makes it easy to flip to your phone function to make or take calls hands-free. Wirelessly pair up to two devices at once using Bluetooth.

products.name: Tomtom VIA 5" GPS (1505M) - Refurbished
products.shortDescription: *Refurbished. Turn your daily commute or long driving excursions into a more enjoyable experience with TomTom's VIA 1505 M car navigation. It's easy to operate and offers an array of convenience features that get you to places faster, from updated maps to 3D images of road signs and highway intersections so you don't have to miss a turn.

products.name: DOD HD Dashboard Camera With GPS (LS430W)
products.shortDescription: The DOD Dashboard Camera has a lot to offer. This car DVR delivers high-quality images whether it's day or night, thanks to the 1080p Full HD video recording, a six-layered glass lens for enhanced clarity, and Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) technology that records clearly in low light. A built-in GPS logging system and G-sensor are also included.

products.name: JVC 2-DIN Multimedia Deck (KW-V20BT)
products.shortDescription: It's never an idle drive with a fully loaded auto entertainment unit from JVC on board. The KW-V20BT provides all the audio features and sound controls you want with all the connectivity options you never knew you needed. Stream tunes from your smartphone as you charge it; gesture controls make it as easy to change tracks as it is to answer calls.

products.name: TomTom 5" GPS (VIA 1505TM)
products.shortDescription: With Lifetime Map and Traffic updates*, the TomTom VIA 1505TM is the ideal travel guide for your road trips. It comes equipped with maps of Canada, the US and Mexico, and boasts a super-slim design with a 5" touchscreen and more making it easy to get from A to B and back again.

products.name: Alpine Electronics MP3/WMA Bluetooth Car Deck With Aux Input (UTE-42BT)
products.shortDescription: The Alpine Electronics UTE-42BT digital media receiver is packed with plenty of features that'll make your commute easier and more enjoyable. Featuring Bluetooth technology and a mountable microphone, this receiver lets you take hands-free calls and stream music from your Bluetooth devices. It also has a front USB input for plugging in your iPod or MP3 player.

products.name: JVC 2-DIN Bluetooth CD Deck (KW-R910BT)
products.shortDescription: Get the most bumping audio for your auto. This fully-loaded 2-DIN factory-look JVC car stereo packs a ton of features behind a huge display, including Bluetooth connectivity for power by your smart devices, and phone pairing that keeps you connected during your travel. Customize your sound, look, and playback all from one intuitive dashboard hub.

products.name: DOD Rearview Mirror Camera (RX7WP)
products.shortDescription: The DOD Tech RX7W+ is a fully featured 1080p Full-HD dash camera that gives you the ability to keep track of anything going on in front of your vehicle. Whether for safety, security, or personal interest, this discreet dash camera delivers a wide viewing angle so you get more of the area within frame, and also exceptional video quality.

products.name: JVC KD-R950BT Bluetooth MP3/WMA/WAV CD Single-DIN Car Deck With iPod/iPhone Control & Aux Input
products.shortDescription: Get better on-the-go audio with a JVC car stereo. The KD-R950BT comes fully-loaded, with playback support for an array of file types and connectivity options that help you make the most of all your technology. Combine your smartphone or MP3 player for intuitive app and media navigation that lets you listen to stored music, manipulate apps and more.

products.name: TomTom START 4.3" GPS (45M)
products.shortDescription: The TomTom START 45M ensures you'll always know where you're going with the 4.3" touchscreen display and spoken turn-by-turn directions. Feel comfortable in traffic in any city with features such as Advanced Lane Guidance, IQ Routes, and Lifetime Maps.

products.name: Genius HD Vehicle Recorder (DVR-535)
products.shortDescription: Document the road ahead with the Genius DVR-535 HD vehicle recorder. Recording video in 1280 x 720 resolution, this camera can record the driving conditions around your or capture evidence in an accident. It features a 2.4" panel where you can watch replays of your recordings.

products.name: Magellan RoadMate 5" Dashcam Navigator (6230-LM)
products.shortDescription: Get behind the wheel worry-free thanks to the Magellan RoadMate 6230-LM Dashcam Navigator. The forward facing camera is designed to automatically record HD videos in an endless recording loop that eliminates the need to interact with the unit. It also includes premium navigation features so you'll never get lost on the road again.

products.name: DOD Car Dash Camera (LS460W)
products.shortDescription: If you're ever in a vehicle collision, it's important to have the facts of the event on video as evidence. That's where the DOD Tech LS460W dash cam comes in. This is a high-end cam with a Sony Exmor CMOS sensor that records at 1080p Full-HD resolution for a clear and detailed image while providing extraordinary night time recording capabilities.

products.name: Pioneer 7" 2-DIN Multimedia Deck (AVH-X4600BT)
products.shortDescription: With just a connection to your USB compatible device, Mixtrax from Pioneer lets your playlist becomes the star of the show. As you drive along, it offers automatic remixes and DJ-inspired effects for you and your friends to enjoy. It even adds to the mood with lighting that intuitively pulse to the beat of the music for a club-like element.

products.name: Garmin Nuvi 4.3" GPS (40LM)
products.shortDescription: With free Lifetime Maps and a vibrant 4.3" touchscreen, the Garmin nüvi 40LM GPS navigator makes it a cinch to get just about anywhere. Touch the screen to look up addresses and to be guided to your destination with voice-prompted, turn-by-turn directions that speak street names. It comes in two mapping versions and has preloaded maps for the 49 States or the 49 States and Canada.

products.name: Garmin nüvi 5" GPS (3590LMT)
products.shortDescription: The Garmin nüvi 3590LMT features advanced voice-activated navigation to give you total control while you navigate behind the wheel. And with a 5-inch touchscreen, Bluetooth hands-free calling, Lifetime Traffic and Map updates, preloaded maps of North America, and more it's the only travelling companion that won't ask, "are we there yet?"

products.name: Kenwood Bluetooth USB/MP3/WMA CD Car Deck With iPod Control (KDC-BT558U)
products.shortDescription: Go on the road with your favourite tunes with the Kenwood KDC-BT558U CD receiver with Bluetooth. With the ability to play CDs, wirelessly stream tunes via Bluetooth, or connect to your iPod, this car deck can keep any commute enjoyable. You can even take hands-free calls from your smartphone, keeping your hands on the wheel for more important things, like driving.

products.name: TomTom GO 6.1" GPS (60C)
products.shortDescription: Newly redesign, the new TomTom GO 60 puts you in control of your drive. Feel comfortable in traffic in any city with features such as Advanced Lane Guidance, Quick Search, and Tap and Go.

products.name: JVC KD-R750 USB/MP3/WAV CD Single-DIN Car Deck With iPod/iphone Control & AUX Input
products.shortDescription: Customize the look and sound of your car stereo. The JVC KD-R750 offers playback of an array of file types from different devices so you can diversify your soundtrack as you travel. Modify your illumination colours to suit your current playlist or set the mood for day or night driving, turning your car into your own personal atmospheric nightclub.

products.name: Kenwood Bluetooth 6.1" Navigation Reciever (DNX571EX)
products.shortDescription: The Garmin DNX571EX navigation receiver makes trips on the road smooth and enjoyable. Built-in Garmin GPS guidance helps you navigate roads and highways, while Bluetooth and an external microphone keep your hands on the wheel during phone calls. With various connectivity options, this receiver also lets you stream your favourite tunes from compatible devices.
